sentences.sentence: As a dramatist, I hate to moralize.
sentences.translation: 作为一名剧作家，我很讨厌说教。

sentences.sentence: He was contemporary with the dramatist Congreve.
sentences.translation: 他与剧作家康格里夫属于同一时代。

sentences.sentence: As the great contemporary poet and dramatist Ben Jonson said, "He was not of an age, but for all time."
sentences.translation: 正如伟大的同时代诗人和剧作家本·琼森所说：“他不属于一个时代，而属于所有时代。”
